Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

When i was young i always played an awesome game. I played it in 2004 or 2005 and it was about tanks and stuff.

When you started the game, you could choose a part of earth to battle on (like amerika, russia or afrika) and then you had to choose a mission.

After that a menu appeared with what tanks/trucks/soldiers and you started the game.

Sometimes the mission was to destroy the enemy base, sometimes to defend your base and sometimes to just destroy every tank of the enemy team. it was possible to get upgrades by grabbing boxes dropped by a heli.

****, i just cant remember it all very well coz i was quite young at that moment. I only remember that i played it with a joystick my dad gave me and he always helped me (good times).

if someone thinks he knows the game, post the name please!

tnx
